summary: A dedicated Electronics and Telecommunication professional with a strong background in machine learning, web development, and cloud platforms. Proven ability to lead projects, solve complex problems, and continuously learn new technologies to drive innovation and efficiency.

education.details: Specialized in Machine Learning and Signal Processing. Relevant coursework includes Advanced Algorithms, Neural Networks, and Communication Systems.

education.institution: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology
education.details: Graduated with First Class Honors. Engaged in multiple projects focusing on embedded systems and wireless communication.

projects.title: Socio-Economic Impact of Pollution on Life Expectancy
projects.description: A machine learning project analyzing the impact of air pollution on life expectancy, integrating multiple socio-economic parameters.

projects.title: Personal Chatbot
projects.description: Developed a chatbot to interactively present my resume, utilizing Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) for accurate and context-specific responses.

projects.title: IoT and ML based Weather Prediction System
projects.description: Designed and implemented an embedded system for automating household tasks, enhancing efficiency and reliability.
